title: BIOLOGY/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry any other Science subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Economics and any other subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Economics and any other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, French and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, French and any other subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/IGBO
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Igbo and any other subjects.
subjects: Igbo, Christian Religious Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Physics and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Economics, Mathematics/Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science and Chemistry.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any other two (2) Science subjects.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject.

title: ECONOMICS/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French, Literature in English and any other Arts subjects.
subjects: French, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/IGBO
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Igbo Language and any other Arts  subject
subjects: Igbo, Literature in English,  and any Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: GEOGRAPHY/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, Chemistry and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.

title: GEOGRAPHY/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and two (2) of Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Christian Religious Studies, Economics.
subjects: Geography and two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: IGBO/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Igbo, Government/History and any one (1)  ((1) Arts/Social  Science subject.
subjects: Igbo, History/Government and any one (1) Arts/Social Science subject.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology/Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

title: INTEGRATED SCIENCE/MATHEMATICS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the following

1. Biology/Agricultural Science

2. Chemistry

3. Physics and

4. General Science
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of: Biology, Physics and Chemistry.

title: SOCIAL STUDIES(DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.
